findings.rationale: A five-year duration for confidentiality may not be sufficient for certain sensitive information, potentially exposing parties to risks after expiration.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: The restriction on assignment without consent could limit business flexibility and hinder future transactions or partnerships.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.

findings.rationale: The agreement does not specify what constitutes a breach or the types of injunctive relief available, leading to ambiguity in enforcement.
findings.evidence_quote: The parties acknowledge that monetary damages may be inadequate for breach of this Agreement.
